resources.string:
Use BookWorm to keep track of books you have read, and you intend to read. Maintain a log of text books, audio books, online articles, any reading you do - all in one place for later reference and sharing.
 

Select a list to work with: Books I've Read or Books I Want to Read

Add books to a list with the menu - either by scanning the UPC, searching, or typing in directly

Books are stored with title, author, rating, and blurb (anything you want)

View books by scrolling your lists and selecting them
